languages.text: "Давно пора, {name}!" {n}Каллигос ободряюще хлопает вас по плечу и жестом созывает свиту.{/n} "Не знаю, сколько еще времени займут поиски следов. Но у Вортена глаз наметан, да и нюх прямо как у пса — не пропадем! К тому же теперь лес на нашей стороне. Идем, не отставай только".

traits.locale_text: "Давно пора, {name}!" {n}Каллигос ободряюще хлопает вас по плечу и жестом созывает свиту.{/n} "Не знаю, сколько еще времени займут поиски следов. Но у Вортена глаз наметан, да и нюх прямо как у пса — не пропадем! К тому же теперь лес на нашей стороне. Идем, не отставай только".

languages.text: "It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"
languages.original_text: "Давно пора, {name}!" {n}Каллигос ободряюще хлопает вас по плечу и жестом созывает свиту.{/n} "Не знаю, сколько еще времени займут поиски следов. Но у Вортена глаз наметан, да и нюх прямо как у пса — не пропадем! К тому же теперь лес на нашей стороне. Идем, не отставай только".

traits.locale_text: "It's about time, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and gestures to gather his entourage.{/n} "I don't know how much time the search for footprints will take, but Worten here has a keen eye and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we'll be fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

"It's about time, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and gestures to gather his entourage.{/n} "I don't know how much time the search for footprints will take, but Worten here has a keen eye and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we'll be fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

"It's about time, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and gestures to gather his entourage.{/n} "I don't know how much time the search for footprints will take, but Worten here has a keen eye and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we'll be fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

"It's about time, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and gestures to gather his entourage.{/n} "I don't know how much time the search for footprints will take, but Worten here has a keen eye and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we'll be fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

"It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

"It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

languages.text: «¡Ya iba siendo hora, {name}!». {n}Calligos te da una amistosa palmada en el hombro y llama a su séquito con un gesto.{/n} «Tardaremos un tiempo en encontrar su rastro, pero aquí Worten tiene una vista aguda y su sentido del olfato rivaliza con el de cualquier sabueso viejo. ¡Nos irá bien! Sobre todo ahora que el bosque está de nuestra parte. ¡En marcha, y procure no quedarse atrás!».
languages.original_text: "It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya iba siendo hora, {name}!». {n}Calligos te da una amistosa palmada en el hombro y hace un gesto para reunir a su séquito.{/n} «No sé cuánto tiempo nos llevará encontrar sus huellas, pero aquí Worten tiene una vista aguda y su sentido del olfato rivaliza con el de cualquier sabueso viejo. ¡Nos irá bien! Sobre todo ahora que el bosque está de nuestra parte. ¡En marcha, y procure no quedarse atrás!».

languages.text: “确实是时候出发了，{name}！”{n}卡里戈斯友好地拍了拍你的肩膀，打了个手势，示意他的随行人员集合。{/n}“追踪那些猎物的脚印可能要花些时间，但沃尔腾的眼睛很敏锐，鼻子也可以和任何一只老狗媲美，所以肯定没问题！更何况，森林现在也站在咱们这边。咱们出发吧，别落在后面了！”
languages.original_text: "It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

traits.locale_text: “是时候出发了，{name}！”{n}卡里戈斯友好地拍了拍你的肩膀，示意他的随从集合。{/n}“我不知道追踪他们的脚印要花多少时间，但沃尔腾的眼睛很敏锐，鼻子也可以和任何一只老狗媲美，所以咱们一定能找得到！更何况，森林现在也站在咱们这边。咱们出发吧，别落在后面了！”

languages.text: « Enfin, {name} ! » {n}Calligos vous donne une petite tape amicale sur l'épaule et fait signe à son entourage d'approcher.{/n} « Il nous faudra peut-être du temps pour retrouver leur piste, mais Worten a un œil de lynx et son flair rivalise avec celui d'un fin limier. Tout ira bien ! Surtout maintenant que la forêt est avec nous. Allons-y, et tâchez de ne pas vous laisser distancer ! »
languages.original_text: "It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

traits.locale_text: « Enfin, {name} ! » {n}Calligos vous donne une petite tape amicale sur l'épaule et fait signe à son entourage d'approcher.{/n} « Il nous faudra peut-être du temps pour retrouver leur piste, mais Worten a un œil de lynx et son flair rivalise avec celui d'un fin limier. Tout ira bien ! Surtout maintenant que la forêt est avec nous. Allons-y, et tâchez de ne pas vous laisser distancer ! »

languages.text: 「そろそろ時間だ、{name}！」{n}カリゴスは親しげに肩を叩き、側近を集める仕草をする。{/n}「奴らの痕跡を探すのには時間がかかるかもしれないが、このヴォルテンは鋭い目を持っているし、嗅覚はどんな老犬にも負けない。問題はないさ！特に今は森が俺たちの味方についている。さあ、遅れを取るなよ！」
languages.original_text: "It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

traits.locale_text: 「そろそろ時間だ、{name}！」{n}カリゴスは親しげに肩を叩き、側近を集める仕草をする。{/n}「足跡探しにどれだけの時間がかかるかわからないが、このウォーテンは鋭い目を持っているし、嗅覚はどんな老犬にも負けない。問題はないさ！特に今は森が味方してくれる。遅れを取るなよ！」

languages.text: "Es wird in der Tat Zeit, {name}!" {n}Calligos klopft dir freundlich auf die Schulter und ruft mit einer Geste sein Gefolge zu sich.{/n} "Es wird vielleicht eine Weile dauern, ihre Spur zu finden, aber Worten hier hat ein scharfes Auge, und um seinen Geruchssinn würde ihn jeder Hund beneiden. Wir kommen schon zurecht! Vor allem, da der Wald nun auf unserer Seite ist. Gehen wir! Und fallt nicht zurück!"
languages.original_text: "It's about time indeed, {name}!" {n}Calligos gives you a friendly pat on the shoulder and summons his retinue with a gesture.{/n} "It may take a while to find their trail, but Worten here has a keen eye, and his sense of smell can rival any old dog — we will do just fine! Especially with the forest being on our side now. Let's go, and try not to fall behind!"

traits.locale_text: "Wird auch Zeit, {name}!" {n}Calligos klopft dir freundlich auf die Schulter und versammelt mit einer Geste sein Gefolge.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, wie lange die Suche nach Fußspuren dauern wird, aber Worten hier hat ein scharfes Auge, und sein Geruchssinn kann mit jedem alten Hund mithalten. Wir kommen schon zurecht! Vor allem, da der Wald nun auf unserer Seite ist. Gehen wir! Und lasst Euch nicht abhängen!"
